column1: '''''Kelvaquenta''''' (composed of the [[Quenya]] words ''[[kelvar]]'' + ''[[quenta]]'') was the journal of the Linguistic Fellowship of [[Cleveland Tolkien Society]]. The journal was a continuation of the ''Cleveland Tolkien Society Newsletter'' (numbering uninterrupted). Vol. 1, no. 3 (Oct. 1977) - Vol. 1, no. 5 (Spring 1978) are kept in the [[Marquette University
column2: J.R.R. Tolkien Collection at the Marquette Archives]].<ref>{{webcite
